com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view
Class MetaioCloudARViewActivity

java.lang.Object
  MapActivity
      com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.MetaioCloudViewActivity
          com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.MetaioCloudARViewActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener, MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
public class MetaioCloudARViewActivity
extends MetaioCloudViewActivity
implements MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener

This is Junaio AR view activity. It may be executed with default behavior, however for customized behavior and GUI, this should be extended and relevant methods should be overridden.

onSurfaceCreated

public void onSurfaceCreated()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
This is called when GLSurfaceView has been created. The rendering contents can be loaded in this callback, e.g geometries. Furthermore, renderer parameters such as clipping plane limits can be updated. The audio renderer for movie textures should be registered in this callback.

Specified by:
onSurfaceCreated in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
See Also:
getAudioRenderer

updateGUI

protected void updateGUI()
Description copied from class: MetaioCloudViewActivity
Update GUI with respect to current channel.

This is called when new channel details are available. The activity should update any GUI that is related to the channel type or contents, e.g. update channel name, icon etc.

showProgress

protected void showProgress(boolean show)
Description copied from class: MetaioCloudViewActivity
Show progress.

This method is called whenever a background process is started or stopped. Note that is may be called from non GUI thread, so any GUI handling should be done in GUI thread, i.e. Activity.runOnUiThread

Specified by:
showProgress in class MetaioCloudViewActivity
Parameters:
show - true to show, or false to hide progress

showProgressBar

protected void showProgressBar(float progress,
                               boolean show)
Description copied from class: MetaioCloudViewActivity
Show progress bar.

This method is called whenever a POI has been loaded. Note that is may be called from non GUI thread, so any GUI handling should be done in GUI thread, i.e. Activity.runOnUiThread

Specified by:
showProgressBar in class MetaioCloudViewActivity
Parameters:
progress - float between 0.0 and 1.0, determines the progress of the bunch of pois
show - true to show, or false to hide progress

setChannel

protected void setChannel(int channelID)
Description copied from class: MetaioCloudViewActivity
Set channel to be viewed. This will first download channel detail information and then on success it will search POIs. The existing POIs will be removed before performing search.

Overrides:
setChannel in class MetaioCloudViewActivity
Parameters:
channelID - Channel ID to view

showVisualSearchResults

protected void showVisualSearchResults()
This method is called to show visual search results requested by calling MetaioCloudARViewActivity#performChannelVisualSearch().

Note that it is called before the actual request is made, so that application can switch to another Activity, and the activity must register callback to MetaioCloudDataManager to receive the results.

codeValue - Code value

protected void trackAPIUsage(int statusCode,
                             String apiCall,
                             String extraInfo,
                             float requestDuration)
String used to log to your analytics tracking systems if you want. This is just a stub. There is no need to call the superclass.

Parameters:
statusCode - status code of the request logged
apiCall - api call that was requested
extraInfo - addition info
requestDuration - how long did the call take
